attributes.action: Close Borders to Ebola affected west African countries
attributes.additional_details: Close the borders to Ebola affected west African countries. Sierra Leone, Liberia and Guinea are the worst affected countries in the Ebola outbreak. It makes complete sense to just close off our borders to these selected countries before things get out of hand. Being real, these countries contribute very little to our economy and our lives are definitely worth more. Sign this petition today and let's take real action on this.
